Initialize a Decision Tree

Source: R/decision_tracking.R
initialize_decision_tree.Rd

Initialize a Decision Tree

Usage

initialize_decision_tree(analysis_id, analyst, description, path = "decisions")

Arguments

analysis_id

Character string identifying the analysis

analyst

Character string with analyst name

description

Character string describing the analysis

path

Character string specifying where to save the decision tree

Value

Invisibly returns the path to the created decision tree file
